thread.title: Mark Zuckerberg Delhi Town Hall: Facebook boasts over 132 million users in India, with 90% coming from mobile phones
thread.title_full: Mark Zuckerberg Delhi Town Hall: Facebook boasts over 132 million users in India, with 90% coming from mobile phones - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Mark Zuckerberg Delhi Town Hall: Facebook boasts over 132 million users in India, with 90% coming from mobile phones
text: After his town hall with PM Narendra Modi at Menlo Park in September, Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg is now set to visit Delhi on October 28 for yet another town hall. “More than 130 million people use Facebook in India. I’m looking forward to hearing directly from one of our most active and engaged communities,” Zuckerberg wrote on his Facebook page. In the run up to the event, let’s take a look at how India is important to the company as far as its user base is concerned. Earlier this year, Facebook revealed that its user base had touched nearly 1.5 billion with nearly a billion of them active on a daily basis. As far as India is concerned, the »
